Detailed Description

A PrefsPanel used to select directories.

void DirectoriesPrefs::PopulateOrExchange ( ShuttleGui &  S  )  [private]

Places controls on the panel and also exchanges data with them. As of Jun/2006 the only gPrefs value, mTempDir is actually retrieved from gPrefs earlier, so the exchange is with that variable rather than with gPrefs.
